title.narrative: Complemento del Programa de Inversión en Agua Potable y Saneamiento
Supplemental Water Supply and Sanitation Investment Program

description.narrative: The loan will supplement loan 1048/SF-HO, approved in December 1999, for a potable water and sanitation program. The program will finance technical assistance and civil works for medium-sized municipalities that are reforming their provision of potable water and sewerage services.
